data.title: Alphabetical equation
data.solution:
import sys,math

n = int(input())
inpu=[]
for i in range(n):
    eq = input()
    inpu += [ eq ]

for i in inpu:
    ts=" + "
    coef=1
    if "-" in i:
        ts=" - "
        coef = -1
    a,[b,c] = i.split(ts)[0], i.split(ts)[1].split(" = ")

    ret=None
    if c=="?":
        ret= a+ts+b+" = "+chr( (ord(a)-64 + coef*(ord(b) - 64) ) % 26 + 64)
    if b=="?":
        ret= a+ts+chr(coef*(ord(c)-64 - (ord(a) - 64) )%26 + 64)+" = "+c
    if a=="?":
        ret= chr(( ord(c)-64 - coef*(ord(b) - 64) )%26 + 64)+ts+b+" = "+c
    ret=ret.replace("@","Z")
    print(ret)
data.statement:
Solve the alphabetical equation, i.e. find the value of "?".
According to A=1 and Z=26 and operations cycle on the whole alphabet.
"?" unknown may be placed anywhere.

testCases.title: Test 2
testCases.testOut:
K - L = Y
K + M = X
B - E = W
I - T = O

data.constraints:
Letters given are only uppercase : [A-Z].
Equations use only {{+}} or {{-}}
data.stubGenerator:
read n:int
loop n read eq:string(1024)

write L + A = M
data.inputDescription:
<<Ligne 1 :>>  [[N]] number of equations to solve
<<[[N]] next lines:>> equation to solve
